name: vscode-docpilot
description: View PDF files in VSCode from local files or remote URLs

commands.name: summarise
commands.description: Summarise a PDF file and display it in the chat.

commands.name: mindmap
commands.description: Create a mindmap for a PDF file and display it in a new file ediitor.

commands.name: cache-export
commands.description: Export all cached summaries and mindmaps to markdown

docpilot.textProcessing.promptOverheadTo.description: The number of tokens to reserve for the prompt and other metadata when processing text.

docpilot.textProcessing.chunkSizeRatio.description: The ratio of the model's max tokens to use for a single chunk.

docpilot.textProcessing.overlapRatio.description: The ratio of overlap between chunks.

docpilot.textProcessing.defaultBatchSize.description: The default number of chunks to process in a single batch.

docpilot.textProcessing.maxBatchSize.description: The maximum number of chunks to process in a single batch.

docpilot.textProcessing.charsPerToken.description: The estimated number of characters per token.

docpilot.textProcessing.tokenOverheadRat.description: The ratio of overhead to add to the token estimation.

docpilot.pdfViewer.maxCachedTextLayers.description: The maximum number of text layers to cache in the PDF viewer.

docpilot.pdfViewer.visiblePageBuffer.description: The number of pages to render before and after the visible pages.

docpilot.pdfViewer.maxTextDivsPerPage.description: The maximum number of text divs to render per page.

docpilot.pdfViewer.performanceThresholdM.description: The performance threshold in milliseconds for the PDF viewer.

docpilot.pdfViewer.minZoom.description: The minimum zoom level for the PDF viewer.

docpilot.pdfViewer.maxZoom.description: The maximum zoom level for the PDF viewer.

docpilot.pdfViewer.defaultZoom.description: The default zoom level for the PDF viewer.

docpilot.timeouts.textExtractionMs.description: The timeout in milliseconds for text extraction.

docpilot.timeouts.modelRequestMs.description: The timeout in milliseconds for a model request.

docpilot.timeouts.pdfLoadMs.description: The timeout in milliseconds for loading a PDF.

scripts.compile:prod: tsc -p ./tsconfig.prod.json && npm run copy-assets && npm run bundle-webview
scripts.compile: tsc -p ./ && npm run copy-assets && npm run bundle-webview
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p out/webview && cp -r src/webview/assets out/webview/ && cp -r src/webview/templates out/webview/ && cp -r src/webview/scripts out/webview/ && cp -r src/webview/styles out/webview/
scripts.test:unit: npm run compile && node out/test/runTest.js --suite unit
scripts.test:integration: npm run compile && node out/test/runTest.js --suite integration
scripts.test:e2e: npm run compile && npm run compile-e2e && npx playwright test
